price: Dan apabila mereka melihat kamu (Muhammad), mereka hanyalah menjadikan kamu sebagai ejekan (dengan mengatakan), "Inikah orangnya yang diutus Allah sebagai rasul?
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awka in yattakhidhūnaka illā huzuwan ahādhā alladhī baʿatha al-lahu rasūlan
